meta.title: elbe move — Get a Quote
meta.description: Professional moves in Hamburg. Free on-site visit. Transparent pricing.

hero.h1: Careful moves in Hamburg — final quote after on-site visit
hero.trustBullet2: Mandatory on-site inspection before final quote
hero.formMicrocopy: Final price confirmed after a free on-site visit.

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: We offer moves and add-on services across Hamburg.
services.apartmentDesc: Apartment moves are residential relocations for private households. We handle moves from one-room apartments to multi-room houses, including all furniture and personal belongings.
services.furnitureDesc: Furniture assembly includes taking apart and reassembling items like kitchen cabinets, wardrobes, beds, and washing machines. This service ensures your furniture is properly protected during transport.
services.packingDesc: Our packing service provides professional wrapping and boxing of your belongings using protective materials. We ensure fragile items are safely packed for transport.
services.disposalDesc: Sperrmüll disposal is the removal of bulky waste items that cannot be disposed of through regular trash collection. We handle large furniture, appliances, and other bulky items that need special disposal.
services.officeDesc: Office moves are commercial relocations for businesses and offices. We handle desks, filing cabinets, office equipment, and ensure minimal business disruption during the move.
services.boxesDesc: Moving boxes and packing materials are available on request. We provide sturdy cardboard boxes, bubble wrap, packing tape, and other protective materials to help you pack your items safely.

trust.title: Why us
trust.scope: Clear scope confirmation before move day

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.intro: Getting a moving quote in Hamburg involves four simple steps. We provide transparent pricing after assessing your specific needs.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Fill out our online form with your move details including dates, locations, and apartment size. We respond within 24 hours.
howItWorks.step2Desc: We schedule a free on-site visit to assess your space, access points, and move requirements. This visit is mandatory for accurate pricing.
howItWorks.step3Desc: After the inspection, we provide a final fixed-price quote with no hidden fees. All prices include VAT.
howItWorks.step4Desc: On your scheduled move day, we handle everything according to the confirmed scope. Your belongings are protected and moved carefully.
howItWorks.banner: We do not confirm final prices without inspection.

pricing.title: Pricing (non-binding, incl. VAT)
pricing.subtitle: All prices are indicative. The final price is agreed after a free on-site visit.
pricing.vatNote: Exact price confirmed after visit. All prices incl. VAT.

calculator.title: Cost calculator
calculator.subtitle: Enter contact details, then get an estimate. Final price after on-site visit.
calculator.name: Name
calculator.resultSuffix: EUR. Final price confirmed after free on-site visit.

quoteForm.title: Request a quote
quoteForm.subtitle: We respond within 24 hours. After receiving your request we will arrange a free on-site visit.
quoteForm.name: Name
quoteForm.gdpr: I have read the privacy policy and consent to the processing of my data for the purpose of contact.
quoteForm.success: Thank you. We will get back to you within 24 hours and arrange a free on-site visit.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: Why is an on-site visit required?
faq.a1: An on-site visit is required because we need to see your space, assess access points, and evaluate the actual scope of work. Only then can we reliably assess scope, access, and effort and give you a fair final quote. This ensures no surprises on move day.
faq.a2: We get back to you within 24 hours of your request. Most inquiries receive a response the same day during business hours.
faq.q3: What happens after I submit the form?
faq.a3: After you submit the form, we call or email you within 24 hours to arrange a free on-site visit. During the visit, we assess your move requirements and provide a final quote. You receive the final quote after the visit.
faq.q4: What does assembly and disassembly include?
faq.a4: Assembly and disassembly includes kitchen cabinets, wardrobes, beds, washing machines, and similar furniture items. The exact scope is agreed during the on-site visit when we can see what needs to be taken apart and reassembled.
faq.a5: We discuss disposal needs during the on-site visit and provide a separate cost estimate for bulky waste removal. Disposal costs depend on the volume and type of items you need removed.
faq.a6: Yes, we are available Monday through Saturday by appointment. Weekend availability depends on our schedule, so we recommend booking early.
faq.q7: How do you handle parking and access?
faq.a7: During the on-site visit, we clarify parking options and building access details including elevator availability and floor numbers. This ensures move day runs smoothly without delays.
faq.a8: Yes. All prices include VAT and are indicative until after the on-site visit. The final price confirmed after the visit also includes VAT.

cookieBanner.message: We use cookies for analytics and advertising. You can withdraw your consent at any time.
